text:
Passio | Menlo Park, CA | Senior Mobile/iOS/Android Dev | Full-time

Do you want to challenge yourself in deploying real-time neural networks on mobile devices to millions of users?

Passio is looking for a full-time Mobile/iOS/Android engineer to lead the development and support of our real-time neural mobile App and our FusionAI SDK.

Take a look at the demos: - https://youtu.be/7k25KHvDr78 - https://youtu.be/0ojGscuhAuU

Passio is a spin-off from SRI international, funded by top angel investors of the valley and with a stellar team.

Apply Now: https://www.passiolife.com/careers
